physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 38 )), %2,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3))
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'ORDER' THEN  LOOKUP( SPARSE %2, %3,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%4), %3) WHEN %1 = 'RETURN' THEN  LOOKUP( SPARSE %5, %3,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%4), %3) END
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1, %2,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3),  CAST (%2 AS DOUBLE PRECISION ))
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1, %2,  CAST (%2 AS DOUBLE PRECISION ),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3))
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 38 )),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3),  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 38 )))

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: LOOKUP( SPARSE %1, %2,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3),  CAST (%2 AS DOUBLE PRECISION ))
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1, %2,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3),  CAST (%2 AS DOUBLE PRECISION ))
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1, %2,  CAST (%2 AS DOUBLE PRECISION ),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3))

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: LOOKUP( SPARSE %1, %2,  CAST (%2 AS DOUBLE PRECISION ),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3))
CASE  WHEN  NOT %1 IS NULL  THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CASE  WHEN  NOT %2 IS NULL  THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3),  CASE  WHEN  NOT %2 IS NULL  THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END )

logicalColumns.name: Past Due Schedule Ship Date Range

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY ,  CASE  WHEN %1 =  DATE '1901-01-01' THEN  NULL  ELSE %1 END ,  CURRENT_DATE ) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN '1 - 3' WHEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY ,  CASE  WHEN %1 =  DATE '1901-01-01' THEN  NULL  ELSE %1 END ,  CURRENT_DATE ) BETWEEN 4 AND 7 THEN '4 - 7' WHEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY ,  CASE  WHEN %1 =  DATE '1901-01-01' THEN  NULL  ELSE %1 END ,  CURRENT_DATE ) BETWEEN 8 AND 14 THEN '8 - 14' WHEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY ,  CASE  WHEN %1 =  DATE '1901-01-01' THEN  NULL  ELSE %1 END ,  CURRENT_DATE ) > 14 THEN '> 14' END
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1, %2,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3),  CAST (%2 AS DOUBLE PRECISION ))

logicalColumns.name: Shipped Lines from Inventory Indicator Code
Shipped Lines from Inventory Indicator
logicalColumns.descriptorColumn: Shipped Lines from Inventory Indicator Code

logicalColumns.name: Past Due Open Lines Indicator Code

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'N' AND %2 <  CURRENT_DATE  THEN 'Y' WHEN %1 = 'N' AND %2 >=  CURRENT_DATE  THEN 'N' END

logicalColumns.name: Past Due Open Lines Indicator
logicalColumns.descriptorColumn: Past Due Open Lines Indicator Code

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CASE  WHEN %2 = 'N' AND %3 <  CURRENT_DATE  THEN 'Y' WHEN %2 = 'N' AND %3 >=  CURRENT_DATE  THEN 'N' END ,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%4),  CASE  WHEN %2 = 'N' AND %3 <  CURRENT_DATE  THEN 'Y' WHEN %2 = 'N' AND %3 >=  CURRENT_DATE  THEN 'N' END )
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'RETURN' AND %2 = 'N' THEN 'Y' WHEN %1 = 'RETURN' AND %2 = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE  NULL  END

LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CASE  WHEN %2 = 'RETURN' AND %3 = 'N' THEN 'Y' WHEN %2 = 'RETURN' AND %3 = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE  NULL  END ,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%4),  CASE  WHEN %2 = 'RETURN' AND %3 = 'N' THEN 'Y' WHEN %2 = 'RETURN' AND %3 = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE  NULL  END )
